column1: Part permissioned as applications only received for parts of the site - i.e. West Herts College, Forum, Land around Forum. Outline planning permission granted for latter on 29/06/15. Full planning permission granted for Forum on 10/02/15
Part permissioned as application not received for remaining part of site. Full Permission granted for Drew House and the Factory on 21/08/15
Full application resolved to be granted subject to s106
Hybrid application granted outline / part full permission on 9/03/16

Part permissioned as applications not recived for part of site to south of Red Lion Lane. CoU of Blocks I and K granted 2/04/13. 450 dwellings plus care home, community use, A3, B1 and Day Nursery, etc granted 12/05/10
Query whether this constitutes previously developed land
